sentences.en: After a dull start , It'should brighten up later.
sentences.cn: 早晨阴天,过会儿就会晴朗.

sentences.en: Brighten up your bedroom with a few posters.
sentences.cn: 挂几张印刷画让你的寝室亮丽生色.

sentences.en: David spotted the pink silk lampshade in a shop and thought it would brighten up the room.
sentences.cn: 戴维在一家商店里发现了这款粉色丝绸灯罩，觉得它会让房间亮丽起来。

sentences.en: He brightened up at their words of encouragement.
sentences.cn: 听到他们鼓励的话，他高兴起来。

sentences.en: His eyes brightened and he laughed.
I've brought some flowers to brighten the place up a bit.
sentences.cn: 我带来一些花,把这里装点一下.

sentences.en: If you're handy with a needle you could brighten up your sweater with daisies.
sentences.cn: 如果你针线活做得好，可以在自己的毛衣上绣几朵雏菊做点缀。

sentences.en: In the distance, the sky was beginning to brighten.
In the distance, the sky was beginning to brighten.
It could do with a lick of paint to brighten up its premises.
sentences.cn: 可用少量油彩使四下显得更亮堂。

sentences.en: Seeing him, she seemed to brighten a little.
sentences.cn: 看到他后，她似乎露出点儿喜色。

sentences.en: Some fresh paint will brighten this place up.
sentences.cn: 色彩鲜明的油漆可以把这个地方弄亮些.

sentences.en: That afternoon, Juanita Haydock dropped in to brighten Carol.
sentences.cn: 那天下午, 久恩尼塔·海多克跑来串门,让卡萝尔解解闷.

sentences.en: That does not do much to brighten the prospects of kids in the city.
sentences.cn: 那并不能使城里孩子们的前途更光明些。

sentences.en: The morning sunshine brightened up the room.
sentences.cn: 清晨的阳光照亮了房间。

sentences.en: They have ordered a bit of greenery to brighten up the new wing at Guy's Hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们订购了一些绿色植物，以给盖伊医院的新配楼增添一抹亮色。

sentences.en: Use blonde highlights to brighten your hair.
sentences.cn: 用点金色的挑染，让你的发色明亮起来。

sentences.en: We slapped some paint on the wall to brighten up the room.
sentences.cn: 我们在墙上涂了些油漆以使房间明亮一些.

sentences.en: White paint will brighten the room.
sentences.cn: 白漆将会使房子更明亮.

words.tran_cn: 明亮的，鲜明的；聪明的；愉快的
[光][天] 亮度；聪明，活泼；鲜艳；愉快
明亮；变亮；活跃；快乐高兴

trans.tran_cn: 照亮，使更艳丽，露出喜色，（眼睛）发亮，（使）变得乐观，放晴
trans.tran_en: to become or make sth lighter or brighter in colour
